response.msg:
嗯，用户让我整理关于"JackeyLove致歉"的信息。首先，我需要看看搜索结果中哪些是相关的。结果1到7都是最新的微博，日期是2025年11月4日左右，主要讲的是S15半决赛TES输给T1后JackeyLove的道歉。用户可能想知道他道歉的原因、内容以及后续情况。

然后，注意到结果4、5、6提到他的健康问题，特别是听力下降和耳鸣，可能影响职业生涯。这些信息需要重点提取，因为健康问题是他致歉后的一个重要动态。结果13和14提到他之前在2025年其他比赛失利的道歉，比如6月输给WE和3月的先锋赛败给HLE，这些可以补充背景，说明他多次在关键比赛后道歉的情况。

还要注意结果31中TES经理郭皓的致歉文，提到JackeyLove承担了赛训、运营等多重压力，这能解释他面临的舆论压力。结果36是一篇总结文章，整合了赛事道歉和健康问题，可以用来综合各个时间点的事件。

需要排除不相关信息，比如结果8、9、15、28、29、32都是其他赛事或旧闻，和本次S15的致歉无关。结果10虽然有视频标题但加载失败，无法使用。结果11和12是年龄资料，但用户没问年龄，暂时忽略。

用户可能关心道歉的具体内容、伤病情况、未来规划以及舆论反应。在整理时，要按时间线分近期事件和背景，确保信息准确引用对应的搜索结果。例如，结果1中他承认操作不佳，感谢粉丝；结果6提到听力问题；结果7他维护队友；结果18讨论转会可能。同时，要标注引用来源，避免重复引用同一结果，比如结果1、3、4、5、6、7、13、14、31、36都需要合理分布在各个部分。

最后，整合这些信息，结构上分比赛致歉、健康问题、历史背景、舆论反应和未来展望，每个部分引用相关结果，确保时效性和可信度，尤其是标注优质搜索结果和大V账号的内容。


以下是关于“JackeyLove致歉”事件的完整梳理，综合最新动态与背景信息整理：
### **一、S15半决赛失利致歉（2025年11月）**
1. **比赛结果与反思**
TES在英雄联盟S15全球总决赛半决赛以0:3不敌T1止步四强。JackeyLove赛后专访承认：
- 队伍未发挥应有操作和运营水平，T1状态极佳且资源团施压能力出色；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 3, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229289428748788", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "Ahri_Yo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229392458156841", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "张佳ZHJ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229308939342683", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "召唤师Park", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.16.21.551.551.50/96542c59ly8geqtawegnej20gr0gq0to.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=Upzj2QdMgS", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229289428748788", "vType": 0}}```
- 第三局战术选择（德莱文+泰坦组合）未达预期效果；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229289428748788", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
- 面对LCK战队已遭遇小场十五连败的尴尬纪录。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229289428748788", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **公开致歉内容**
向粉丝表达歉意：“**输掉比赛很对不起大家，希望粉丝找点开心的事度过赛后时光**”，并强调“比赛结束了，大家开心点”。直播中主动承担舆论压力，呼吁观众“别带队友节奏，想喷直接喷我”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [1, 3, 7, 19, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "游戏玩家张大飞", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229291428382308", "index": 7, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229289428748788", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "Ahri_Yo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229392458156841", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "谢谢你的笑声", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228642546486288", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "落日放映室", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229370058999767", "index": 25, "label": ""}], "name": "游戏玩家张大飞", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.511.511.50/7524b2a9ly8gzxx389u78j20e80e73yt.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=7ctYir2uu%2F", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229291428382308", "vType": 0}}```
游戏玩家张大飞
谢谢你的笑声
Ahri_Yo

### **二、健康危机与职业前景**
1. **伤病披露**
直播中首度透露严重健康问题：
- **听力明显下降**，长期耳鸣（“耳朵嗡嗡响”）；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [4, 5, 6], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229388339087958", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "谢谢你的笑声", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229370185617590", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "真白盘游戏", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229294902840563", "index": 6, "label": ""}], "name": "王玮晨", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.480.480.50/005SyZ1Sly8i3tl9bvkkkj30dc0dc3yz.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=3EhbGceIaA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229388339087958", "vType": 0}}```
- 担忧恶化致聋，计划紧急就医检查耳鼻喉科；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [4, 27, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "真白盘游戏", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229365560608345", "index": 30, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229388339087958", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "MagicWisp_", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229381119120236", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "真白盘游戏", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/006ckKLjly8hojpem9x21j30e80e8aas.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=DfHe8De%2FHy", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229365560608345", "vType": 0}}```
- 职业病累积（久坐、长期戴耳机）影响健康，坦言“**自己还想多活几年**”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [4], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229388339087958", "index": 4, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **职业规划**
- 合同即将到期，若续约**只会选择TES**（感念经理郭皓知遇之恩）；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [1, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "丶涵艺", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229309351954946", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229289428748788", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "丶涵艺", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/76c0dacdly8hey0qr5bjnj20go0got9u.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=%2FAoooUGlK9", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229309351954946", "vType": 0}}```
- 未明确退役，但称“明年干不干不知道”，需先治疗伤病再评估；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [4, 22, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "大脸恰瓜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229408379998967", "index": 22, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229388339087958", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "MagicWisp_", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229381119120236", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "大脸恰瓜", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.750.750.50/007rJKiBly8gwbbpdmgnfj30ku0kuwfp.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=eWkpzPrRIa", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229408379998967", "vType": 0}}```
- 若进入自由市场“必遭争抢”，转会规则变动增加不确定性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [18, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "丶涵艺", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229309351954946", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "大脸恰瓜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229408379998967", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
真白盘游戏

### **三、历史致歉事件与舆论评价**
1. **2025年关键赛事失利回顾**
- **6月LPL季后赛负WE**：TES错失MSI资格，JackeyLove道歉“对不起粉丝”；
- **3月先锋赛惨败HLE**：0:3创LPL国际赛事最差战绩（2胜9负），经理郭皓同步发长文担责。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [8, 31, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "竞圈瓜群众", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5144616857766673", "index": 8, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5145308430603724", "index": 31, "label": ""}, {"name": "竞圈乐同框", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5144616195854281", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "竞圈瓜群众", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006lWxDgly8hbui1kaz7mj30u00u0q6b.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=ocgA6Ww0QU", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5144616857766673", "vType": 0}}```

2. **舆论两极分化**
- **认可担当**：粉丝肯定其从S8夺冠至今的坚守，称“伟大需时间沉淀”；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "游弟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229405618308573", "index": 26, "label": "大v"}], "name": "游弟", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/005PyL1ply8hhvybaias8j30u00u0mz8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=Qokpvrr5L%2F", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229405618308573", "vType": 0}}```
- **争议焦点**：
- TES高投入低回报，被批“内战内行外战外行”；
- 个人关键比赛高光减少，但承担最多舆论压力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5145308430603724", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
### **四、事件影响与未来展望**
- **TES管理困境**：经理郭皓曾立“世界赛未雪耻则离职”军令状，先锋赛后已取消全年奖金；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5145308430603724", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
- **LPL赛区危机**：半决赛全军覆没，舆论称“至暗时刻重现”；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 32, "data": {"num": [23, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "凯尔达文", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229408797333461", "index": 23, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "竞圈乐同框", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5144616195854281", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "凯尔达文", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/87329e8bly8hzgn8rg3cdj20e80e8mxx.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=wDwb7enHZu", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229408797333461", "vType": 0}}```
- **选手支持声浪**：多方呼吁关注电竞选手健康，粉丝期盼其“先养病再搏至无憾”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [6, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "真白盘游戏", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229294902840563", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "MagicWisp_", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229381119120236", "index": 27, "label": ""}]}}```
### **时间线梳理**
| 时间 | 事件 | 致歉核心内容 |
|------|------|--------------|
| **2025-11-04** | S15半决赛负T1 | “对不起大家，找点开心的事吧” |
| **2025-11-04** | 直播曝伤病 | “听力减弱恐致聋，需紧急就医” |
| **2025-06-08** | LPL季后赛负WE | “更努力展现好的团队发挥” |
| **2025-03-16** | 先锋赛负HLE | “辜负期待，会调整克服难关” |

```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [1, 3, 4, 5, 8, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "Ahri_Yo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229392458156841", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229289428748788", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229388339087958", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "谢谢你的笑声", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229370185617590", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "竞圈瓜群众", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5144616857766673", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5145308430603724", "index": 31, "label": ""}], "name": "Ahri_Yo", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.928.928.50/008wPWroly8hrhlpd2wi1j30ps0psgnw.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762284668&ssig=C%2B64aPEwEZ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229392458156841", "vType": 0}}```

> 注：部分历史事件日期为背景补充，非本次热搜时效内容。
